DECISION 0-1: Project Scaffolding Structure

Workspace Layout:
- Root Cargo.toml as workspace manifest
- crates/ directory containing all 4 crates (keeps root clean)
- Each crate has minimal lib.rs to pass compilation

Dependency Graph:
- notebook-core: no external deps (as specified), will hold core types
- notebook-store: depends on notebook-core
- notebook-entropy: depends on notebook-core
- notebook-server: depends on notebook-core, notebook-store

Rust Edition: 2024 (latest stable for new projects)

CI Strategy:
- Matrix build on ubuntu-latest
- Steps: cargo build, cargo test, cargo clippy with deny warnings
- Cache cargo registry and target directory

Docker:
- PostgreSQL 16 with Apache AGE extension
- Using apache/age:PG16_latest image
- Expose default port 5432
- Volume for data persistence

Rationale: crates/ subdirectory is conventional for multi-crate workspaces and prevents clutter at root level.
